inclusion.criterion: active, moderate-to-severe Graves' orbitopathy or dysthyroid orbit neuropathy
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: alanine aminotransferase and/or aspartate aminotransferase >2x upper limit of normal
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: present or past medical history of autoimmune hepatitis
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: previous glucocorticoids therapy within the last 6 months
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Uncomplicated neonatal jaundice that may require phototherapy.
